name: I Am Robot
description:
The space shuttle is controlled by an artificial intelligence that has an unexpected system crash.
Nessa, one of the most advanced robots with human intelligence, wakes up unexpectedly from hibernation.
Help Nessie regain her energy, get gear and survive.



I AM ROBOT is a short and dynamic action game with great graphics.



During the game, we observe the action from the third person perspective (TPP).



Take on the role of Nessa, the most advanced robot with human intelligence.
